__e: Still, it doesn't make her t' devil incarnate, does it?
You can tell the angels... you never saw evil so singularly personified... as in the face of the man who killed you.
She never forgot the evil that you are.
Anyway, the darkness has to be driving everything somehow, right?
If I kill the evil that took him and our sister, then we can dream, and remember, and it won't have to be sad.

And I want everyone here tonight to know... that as long as I'm Sheriff of Wayward Pines, I will do everything in my power to ensure... that the evils of this town are brought to light... and that the true criminals are brought to justice.
I will do everything in my power to ensure that the evils of this town are brought to light.
Now they're about to face the greatest evil without you.
Luke was a fine man, but evil is always with us.
Well, evil is upon you, whether you like it or not.
What we see and do in war... the cruelty, is unbelievable.
I see their ugliness, and their beauty... and I wonder how the same thing can be both.
When I was young, I asked my priest how you could get to heaven and still protect yourself from all the evil in the world.
You take a good long look at evil, and it reminds you of one...
